pullrequest.title: Pass Coulomb surface friction parameters to DART

content.raw:
Bullet's friction support is a little hacky right now, in that we are specifying a single friction coefficient per link (see [BulletLink.cc:159](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/8c0503b74a57503cd69bbcaee15479daeec22b58/gazebo/physics/bullet/BulletLink.cc#cl-159).

It's currently looping through all the collision shapes and overwriting the `hackMu[12]` values for each collision. It then sets the link friction after this loop. I need to write a test for multiple collisions with different friction coefficients on a single link.
content.html:
Bullet's friction support is a little hacky right now, in that we are specifying a single friction coefficient per link (see BulletLink.cc:159.

It's currently looping through all the collision shapes and overwriting the hackMu[12] values for each collision. It then sets the link friction after this loop. I need to write a test for multiple collisions with different friction coefficients on a single link.
